description: .357 Magnum ammunition with a 158gr full metal jacket bullet.  The .357 Magnum round is derived from the earlier .38 Special, with a marginally longer case and generating greater pressure.
.357 Magnum ammunition with a 135gr jacketed hollow point bullet.  The .357 Magnum round is derived from the earlier .38 Special, with a marginally longer case and generating greater pressure.

.357 Magnum ammunition with a 158gr full metal jacket bullet.  Someone was down on their luck when they handloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

.357 Magnum ammunition with a 135gr jacketed hollow point bullet.  Someone was down on their luck when they handloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

.357 Magnum ammunition with a 158gr full metal jacket bullet.  This one has been handloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.

.357 Magnum ammunition with a 135gr jacketed hollow point bullet.  This one has been handloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
